title: Socializing and Leisure
description: Improve your French speaking skills with phrases commonly used for socializing and leisure activities. Focus on clear pronunciation and engaging intonation.
instructions: Below, you'll find a list of common phrases related to socializing and leisure activities in French.
Your task is to record yourself speaking each phrase.
Ensure your pronunciation matches the provided text as closely as possible.
Try to maintain a natural and engaging speaking pace.
After recording each phrase, listen to your recording and compare it to the text.
Focus on intonation, clarity, and fluency.
Repeat the recording process as many times as needed to improve your pronunciation.
